meanings.definition: The quality or state of being in accordance with the law.
meanings.sent1: The legality of the contract was questioned by the lawyer.
meanings.sent2: It is important to always consider the legality of your actions.
meanings.sent3: The legality of wearing socks with sandals is a topic of debate.
meanings.sent4: The legality of the situation was as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: She emphasized the legality of following traffic rules to her students.

meanings.definition: The fact of being allowed by law.
meanings.sent1: He was relieved to confirm the legality of his parking spot.
meanings.sent2: The legality of the new policy was discussed in the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The legality of eating ice cream for breakfast brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The legality of the decision shone like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The lawyer emphasized the importance of understanding the legality of the case.
